INTERIOR

Common areas of Harbour Lights are exclusively designed by De Grisogono. The project features flowing, captivating elements that enhance the ultra-luxurious feeling for the residents.

Nestled in the heart of Dubai Maritime City, the Harbour Lights building is a haven of luxury and sophistication. Its spacious apartments offer style and comfort, while the panoramic views provide a breathtaking backdrop to daily life.
